channel.title: The Right Mindset by Froman (Remix by ONE)
channel.description:
The Right Mindset was a song by FROMAN. I simply remixed it, however badly i did it.
Since i’m new to the forums i don’t know if this is copyright infringement or something like that, i will willingly take this post down if the Auxy staff or Froman has a problem with it (even though the song is pretty ancient).
Link privated
I want to perfect this remix and hone my skills. Please leave feedback if you can.

item.description:
MisterMaster:

indication of whether they’re open to being remixed before asking them.

I thought that meant whether the person is open for remixing other people’s tracks

either way it’s probably a no for me

item.title: The Right Mindset by Froman (Remix by ONE)
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
The normal process is to check with the original artist before remixing. @FroMan

You can also click on the users forum pic to get an indication of whether they’re open to being remixed before asking them.

Read full topic
